About me

Heyy! I’m Ruban, a recent graduate enthusiastic about creating polished, user-friendly websites. Armed with an Advanced Diploma in Computer Programming and Analysis, I’m diving into the exciting realm of web development, eager to turn concepts into pixel-perfect reality.

Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I’m constantly honing my skills and embracing new challenges with a spirit of curiosity. I thrive on crafting intuitive interfaces that blend form with function, aiming to make the web a more delightful place one line of code at a time.

Beyond coding, I’m a fervent football enthusiast (not the American kind), lost in a good fantasy book, immersed in epic video game quests, or binge-watching the latest TV series. I love connecting and crafting something extraordinary together!
